nodes.text: A large serpentine creature lived on Kohlma, the burial moon of Bogden. Green in coloration, it possessed eight tentacles surrounding its head which was predominated by a large upward turned vertical mouth filled with sharp teeth and a pair of eyes with slit-like irises. It possessed small spines along its back, and its tentacles appeared to possess suction cups. When cut it bled red blood.

One was present under a bridge that connected Dooku's lair and a landing platform, and was possibly used as a guard beast. It attempted to attack Count Dooku who then preceded to nonchalantly slice though its tentacles with his lightsaber.
This creature has never been canonically named. It has gotten its nickname from its serpentine form and numerous tentacles.
